Class PartialImportWorkflowOperationHandler

org.opencastproject.workflow.handler.composer.PartialImportWorkflowOperationHandler

org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationHandler
public class PartialImportWorkflowOperationHandler extends org.opencastproject.workflow.api.AbstractWorkflowOperationHandler
The workflow definition for handling partial import operations

    • getForceEncodingProfile

      protected com.entwinemedia.fn.data.Opt<org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncodingProfile> getForceEncodingProfile(org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationInstance woi) throws org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationException
      Get the force encoding profile from the operations config options.
      Returns:
      the encoding profile if option "force-encoding" is true, none otherwise
      Throws:
      org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationException - if there is no such encoding profile or if no encoding profile is configured but force-encoding is true
